title: Prayed many prayers without proper Ghusl or Wudu how to make up prayers for past mistakes? assim
transcript:
[Questioner] from the UK my mom used to 
tell me that whenever my Menses ended   um I have to take a shower 
otherwise my prayers would be   invalid I thought it was just like a normal shower 
so um whenever my Menses would end I'd shower   normally and I would pray like many many prayers 
with that with that um invalid um ghusl I later   on found out that rinsing the mouth and nose was 
obligatory do I have to make up these prayers and   um I there's like there's many many prayers 
and I have bad wiswas already and within my   prayers so if I were to make them up it'd 
already be a bit difficult um alhamdulillah is the most merciful most gracious most kind 
and if a person does a mistake out of ignorance   out of negligence such as your mistake Allah 
the almighty forgives it and does not hold you   accountable for it which means that now that you 
know the ruling all of your previous prayers are   valid and accepted due to your ignorance of the 
ruling and from now on you have to be careful   not to skip any of the mandatory acts of your 
ghusl and to follow the Sunnah what alhamdulillah [Music] and have you ever taken a counseling session with 
me go to my website and you will find counseling   sessions and apply for one if you can afford 
it that's good for you if you cannot you're   entitled for one free session and this is for 
everybody if they can affirm by Allah that they   cannot afford it because they're poor I'll give 
them one free session without a problem a full   half an hour so come to me and let's speak 
about it inshallah within the following two   days or three days I will uh try and seek Allah's 
guidance to solve the problem once and for Allah
